Summary: Flaming orb like sphere stood stationary before shapeshifting and jolting across the sky.
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving the robinson mall in pittsburgh,pa which is only a few miles down the road from pittsburgh internationl airport. i was going back to my car and i look up into the sky and see a giant fireball like orb\sphere staying stationary so i'm assuming its a star or planet or some kind. i keep watching and a few minutes after staying stationary it moves rapidly to another part of the sky and changes to green like color before cloaking or going invisible or altogether vanishing deep into the space. there was other activity going on in the sky as jetliners were coming in to land at pittsburgh internationl airport so it was a nice image for depth seeing this huge jet with landing lights and flashing lights coming lower to the ground as the burning star stayed beneath the dark clouds until moving rapidly.
